Header: More Shramadana Campaigns Conducted in Kilinochchi
Content: Troops of the 651 and 652 Brigades of the 65 Division under the Security Force Headquarters â€“ Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN) conducted a few social welfare projects in the Kilinochchi area during 12 - 14 June. 15 (V) Sri Lanka Sinha Regiment (SLSR) of the 651 Brigade assisted in cleaning the Pullayar Kovil premises while troops of the 7 Sri Lanka National Guard (SLNG) under the 652 Brigade cleaned the Akkaryankulam School premises and its surroundings. Above community oriented projects were organized on a suggestion of the Commander, Security Forces - Kilinochchi, Major General Niyshshanka Ranawana and under the supervision of Major General Kumara Peiris, General Officer Commanding, 65 Division.
